titleStmt.title: Moral essays The fourth volumn. Contained in two treatises. The first concerning the four last ends of man. The second concerning the practice of Christian vigilance. Written originally in French, and now translated into English.
Essais de morale. Volume 4. English.
titleStmt.author: Nicole, Pierre, 1625-1695.

titleStmt.title: Moral essays The fourth volumn. Contained in two treatises. The first concerning the four last ends of man. The second concerning the practice of Christian vigilance. Written originally in French, and now translated into English.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for R. Bentley and M. Magnes, in Russell-street, Covent-garden,

notesStmt.note: An anonymous translation of the fourth volume of: Essais de morale. Authorship is generally attributed to Pierre Nicole.
Reproduction of the original in the Christ Church Library, Oxford.
